instructions: Tap the Home tab, then tap the Add button . Tap Add Accessory, then follow the onscreen instructions. When you add an accessory, it s assigned to a default room, or a room you choose.

Tap Rooms, tap the Show Rooms button , then choose the room the accessory is currently assigned to. If it s not already assigned, look in Default Room. Touch and hold the accessory s button in the Home tab until the controls appear, then tap Settings. Tap Room, then choose a room.
Tap Rooms, then tap the Show Rooms button . Tap Room Settings, then tap a room. Tap Zone, then tap an existing zone, or tap Create New to add the room to a new zone.
Tap Rooms, then tap the Show Rooms button . Tap Room Settings, then tap a room.

Tap the Home tab, tap the Add and Edit Home button , then tap Home Settings. Tap Add Home, name the home, then tap Save. To switch to another home, tap the Home tab, tap the Add and Edit Home button , then tap the home you want.
